                    throws org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FormatterException
        Description copied from interface: org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.RenderingScenario
        Renders the scenario into the supplied formatter.
        Specified by:
        renderScenario in interface org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.RenderingScenario
        Parameters:
        formatter - the formatter to render into
        Throws:
        org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.FormatterException - if rendering fails. If this exception is thrown, the supplied formatter may be in an unknown state.
